segments.text: Madam , I made a close study of the draft contract yesterday evening . I think there are something needs to modify .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , about the terms of payment . Your draft contract says that payment is to be made by D \ A . This is not our practice . We prefer to have the payment made by L \ C through a negotiating bank in America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I will add this to the contract .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The second thing I would like to point out , that is packaging . It's stipulated in the contract that all the computer parts should be packed in cardboard boxes . But I think the wooden cases are much safer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you are right . Is there anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As far as the contract stipulations are concerned , there is nothing more . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have agreed on all the major points .
segments.speaker: S2
